  • Method Details

    • getNickName

      public String getNickName()
      Returns:
      the nickname of the client or null if not set.

    • getController

      public GamesController getController()
      Returns:
      the GamesController instance associated with this client handler.

    • getServer

      public Server getServer()
      Returns:
      the Server instance associated with the client handler

    • disconnect

      protected void disconnect()
      Disconnects the current client from the server and its associated game.

    • handleAction

      public void handleAction(Action action)
      Handles an incoming Action instance by processing it through the associated game controller. Logs any errors and updates the game state accordingly if exceptions occur during processing.
      Parameters:
      action - the action to be processed.

    • handleSubscription

      public boolean handleSubscription(Action action)
      Handles the subscription process for a client. If the client is already associated with a nickname, the operation is logged and fails. Otherwise, the client's subscription request is processed, and if valid, the client is subscribed to the server.
      Parameters:
      action - the Action instance containing the subscription request and the player's nickname.
      Returns:
      true if the subscription is successfully completed; false if the subscription fails due to invalid actions, invalid state, or the client already being subscribed.

    • provideJoinableGames

      public List<Game.GameInfo> provideJoinableGames()
      Provides a list of games that are currently available for the client to join. This method retrieves the list of joinable games by querying the associated game controller.
      Returns:
      a list of Game.GameInfo objects representing the joinable games.
